decks.notes: This deck focuses on playing small creatures with +1/+1 counters and utilizing artifacts to quickly amass a powerful board presence. By combining Hardened Scales with creatures like Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp and Patchwork Automaton, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures that can quickly grow out of control. The inclusion of cards like Arcbound Ravager and Walking Ballista allow for additional flexibility and the ability to close out games quickly. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Pithing Needle and Soul-Guide Lantern to disrupt the opponent's strategy.

The main goal of this Boros Aggro deck is to play aggressive creatures like Amped Raptor and Ocelot Pride, while also utilizing burn spells like Lightning Bolt to control the board. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to pressure the opponent. Additionally, the deck has cards like The One Ring and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to provide additional strength and resilience in combat. The mana base includes lands like Sacred Foundry and fetch lands to ensure consistent mana availability.

The main concept of this deck is to use instant reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance to bring powerful creatures like Emperor of Bones, Koma, World-Eater, and Ulamog, the Defiler onto the battlefield quickly. The deck also utilizes counter spells like Force of Negation and Spell Snare to protect its combo pieces, while cards like Psychic Frog and Tainted Indulgence help control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast reanimation and powerful creatures, while also maintaining control and disrupting the opponent's game plan.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on utilizing its powerful creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and finish the game before they can stabilize. By combining efficient threats like Tarmogoyf, Ragavan, and Nethergoyf with disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Urza's Saga and Orcish Bowmasters provides additional utility and value, while cards like Jegantha, the Wellspring and Boseiju, Who Endures offer unique advantages to help secure victory in various matchups.
